Phrasal verb
fart around
fart noun [C]
(PERSON)
offensive a rude word for a person who is considered to be boring, annoying, or unpleasant: old fart He's a pompous old fart.
fart noun [C]
(GAS)
very informal an escape of gas from the bowels: to do a fart
